com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.engine.optimizer
Class Optimizer

java.lang.Object
  com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.engine.optimizer.Optimizer

public class Optimizer
extends java.lang.Object

The class provides static methods for handling with the optimizer

Author:
Markus Stocker
